mapper.insert: insert into ch_member values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthdate}, #{fav_books}, sysdate, #{ch_count}, #{ch_suc_count}, null, null)
mapper.select: select * from ch_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select count(*) from ch_member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ch_member set pw=#{pw}, nick=#{nick}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, fav_books=#{fav_books} where id=#{id}
update ch_member set nick=#{nick}, profile_img=#{profile_img}, intro=#{intro} where id=#{id}
